In stark contrast to Dominion's bustling, ever-busy streets, the city's back alleys are all but completely deserted. Most likely due to their deserved reputation as being the dangerous home to muggers and rapists, you find that most of your time travelling through these twisting, labyrinthine passageways is spent in complete isolation. As you turn the next corner, however, your solitary journey is interrupted, as up ahead you see [npc.a_fullRace(true)] leaning back against one of the alley's walls.
